service.name: /dctm501.dm
service.query: SELECT A.CUST_ID , A.CUST_NAME , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', A.SS_NO) AS SS_NO , COM.FN_GET_COMM_NAME('D', 'D002', A.SEX_CD) AS SEX_NM , A.BIRTH_DT , TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.BIRTH_DT),'YYYY')) +1 AS AGE , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', MOBILE_PH1) || DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', MOBILE_PH2) || DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', MOBILE_PH3) AS MOBILE_PH , ( CASE NVL(A.EMAIL1, ' ') WHEN ' ' THEN '' ELSE DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', A.EMAIL1) || '@' || DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', A.EMAIL2) END) AS EMAIL , A.HNEW_ZIP_CD1 AS HNEW_ZIP_CD , A.HNEW_ADDR1 || ' ' || HNEW_ADDR2 AS HNEW_ADDR , A.HOME_ADDR1 || ' ' || HOME_ADDR2 AS HOME_ADDR , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', C.CARD_NO) AS CARD_NO , A.STR_CD -- 가입점 , A.ENTR_DT -- 최초가입일자 , B.CUST_GRADE -- 회원등급 (D011) , A.SMS_YN -- SMS수신동의여부 , D.POINT -- 누적포인트 , DECODE(A.POST_RCV_CD,'H','Y','O','N','N') POST_RCV_CD -- 우편물수신동의여부 FROM DCS.DM_CUSTOMER A, DCS.V_DO_CUST_GRADE_CURR B, DCS.DM_CARD C, DCS.DO_CUST_TPOINT D WHERE A.CUST_ID = B.CUST_ID AND A.ENTR_PATH_CD = B.BRCH_ID(+) AND A.CUST_ID = C.CUST_ID(+) AND A.CUST_ID = D.CUST_ID AND A.STR_CD LIKE ? || '%' --AND C.ISSUE_DT BETWEEN X AND X AND A.ENTR_DT BETWEEN ? AND ? AND C.CARD_STAT_CD NOT IN ('2', '4') AND B.CUST_GRADE LIKE ? || '%' AND A.SEX_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND D.POINT BETWEEN ? AND ? AND A.SMS_YN LIKE '%' || ? || '%' --AND SUBSTR(DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', A.SS_NO), 3,4) LIKE X || '%' AND SUBSTR(A.BIRTH_DT, 5,6) LIKE ? || '%' AND ( NVL(A.HNEW_ADDR1, ' ') LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR NVL(A.HOME_ADDR1, ' ') LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) AND A.POST_RCV_CD LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY A.CUST_ID, A.CUST_NAME
